channel.title: Steve K8qky on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Steve K8qky on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Some highlights of MLK Day 2016 on the U of Michigan campus
item.description:
A few notes from MLK Day.

A morning trip to Roos Roast, enjoying a cup of Portland in the 90s coffee and a hard boiled egg from Farmer John’s Our Family Farm.

The University of Michigan Men’s Glee Club, singing at the annual MLK Day symposium at the U of M, monitored via a remote video feed.

A bus trip to the UM Computer and Video Game Archive, in the basement of the Duderstadt Center, for some quality time with my 10 yo and a chance to play Centipede and Driver San Francisco.

A walk across the N Campus Diag (under construction) to the W8UM shack in the EECS building, where I talked to Steve K8QKY who was working a station that was on a DXpedition to the S Sandwich Islands.

The bus trip was fine business as well - on the way there I talked to W8TAM and the return trip was a QSO with KB6NU.
